SEARCH:
程序包 IOS_SHOGUN_Component.Audio

类 JNAudio

java.lang.Object
IOS_SHOGUN_Component.Audio.JNAudio
public class JNAudio extends Object
The JNAudio plugin is a text-to-speech plugin of the colorful framework, you need to introduce the location of the JNAudio .dll before using it After you need to instantiate JNAudio, initModelInitModel makes Java instantiation classes bound by dll libraries, and when the program ends you need closeAudio to release them Have fun - AtomicJun, here are some of JNAudio's APIs, This plugin can only be used on Windows. JNAudio 插件,是colorful框架的文字转语音插件,在使用前你需要先引入JNAudio.dll的位置 后你需要实例化JNAudio后initModel/InitModel使Java实例化类被dll库绑定,当程序结束时你需要closeAudio释放他们 祝你愉快-AtomicJun,下面是一些JNAudio的API,此插件只能在Windows上使用.
另请参阅:
  • JNAudio

  • 构造器概要

    构造器
    构造器
    说明
    JNAudio()
     

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型
    方法
    说明
    void
    closeAudio()
    Release Java objects and bound dll objects, if after freeing, you will not be able to make JN Audio calls, you need to use the init Model Init Model to rebind 释放Java对象以及绑定的dll对象，如果释放后，你将无法进行JNAudio的调用，需要使用initModel/InitModel重绑定
    int
    get_speech_rate()
    Get the sonic speed of JN Audio 获取JNAudio的音速大小
    int
    get_speech_size()
    Get the sound effect size of JN Audio 获取JNAudio的音效大小
    void
    initModel()
    Bind Java instantiated class IDs to Dll objects, and only need to use them once per binding 将Java实例化类ID绑定Dll对象,每次绑定只需要使用一次 This will cause the plug-in library to generate a separate DLL object and bind the Java class you instantiated this time, which can be used separately under multithreading, the object needs to exit at the end, and the plug-in library will automatically recycle 这将会使插件库生成一个单独的 DLL 对象，并绑定您此次实例化的Java类，可以在多线程下单独使用，该对象需要在最后退出，插件库会自动回收 (当你释放时使用initModel/InitModel会重新实例化.
    void
    InitModel(String sa)
    Unlike init Model, this is the second instance before the dll is bound to the Java instance class, which changes the default text of the dll object 与initModel的不同之处，这是dll绑定Java实例类前的第二种实例，可以使dll对象的默认文本发生变化
    void
    speech_continual()
    Resume a paused voice 恢复被暂停的语音
    void
    speech_end()
    Release the last text-to-speech 释放上次文字转语音
    void
    speech_parser()
    Pause voice speech 暂停语音语音
    void
    speech_spb_output(String SPBindToFile, String SPBindText)
    Bind the text-to-speech data format as WAV to a local file.
    void
    speechUp(String sa)
    Convert text to PCM voice and play it directly (text to speech), and the content junk will be automatically collected at the end 将文字转换为PCM语音并直接播放(文字转语音)，结束时会自动回收内容垃圾
    void
    tryAgain()
    Re-instantiate the DLL but Java does not change and can be used with already bound 重新实例化DLL但Java不会改变，可以在已经绑定的情况下使用
    void
    updateAudioRate(int rate)
    Change the speed of sound in JN Audio 改变JNAudio的音速大小
    void
    updateAudioSize(int size)
    Change the sound size of JN Audio 改变JNAudio的音效大小
    void
    updateAudioText(String text)
    Update the default speech-to-text content 更新默认的语音转文字内容

    从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • 构造器详细资料

    • JNAudio

      public JNAudio()

  • 方法详细资料

    • initModel

      public void initModel()
      Bind Java instantiated class IDs to Dll objects, and only need to use them once per binding 将Java实例化类ID绑定Dll对象,每次绑定只需要使用一次 This will cause the plug-in library to generate a separate DLL object and bind the Java class you instantiated this time, which can be used separately under multithreading, the object needs to exit at the end, and the plug-in library will automatically recycle 这将会使插件库生成一个单独的 DLL 对象，并绑定您此次实例化的Java类，可以在多线程下单独使用，该对象需要在最后退出，插件库会自动回收 (当你释放时使用initModel/InitModel会重新实例化.
      另请参阅:
      • JNAudio

    • InitModel

      public void InitModel(String sa)
      Unlike init Model, this is the second instance before the dll is bound to the Java instance class, which changes the default text of the dll object 与initModel的不同之处，这是dll绑定Java实例类前的第二种实例，可以使dll对象的默认文本发生变化
      参数:
      sa - 文本
      另请参阅:
      • JNAudio

    • tryAgain

      public void tryAgain()
      Re-instantiate the DLL but Java does not change and can be used with already bound 重新实例化DLL但Java不会改变，可以在已经绑定的情况下使用
      另请参阅:
      • JNAudio

    • speechUp

      public void speechUp(String sa)
      Convert text to PCM voice and play it directly (text to speech), and the content junk will be automatically collected at the end 将文字转换为PCM语音并直接播放(文字转语音)，结束时会自动回收内容垃圾
      参数:
      sa - 语音内容

    • speech_end

      public void speech_end()
      Release the last text-to-speech 释放上次文字转语音
      另请参阅:
      • JNAudio

    • speech_parser

      public void speech_parser()
      Pause voice speech 暂停语音语音
      另请参阅:
      • JNAudio

    • speech_continual

      public void speech_continual()
      Resume a paused voice 恢复被暂停的语音
      另请参阅:
      • JNAudio

    • speech_spb_output

      public void speech_spb_output(String SPBindToFile, String SPBindText)
      Bind the text-to-speech data format as WAV to a local file. You need to pay attention to whether your program permissions are sufficient. 将文字转语音的数据格式为WAV绑定到本地文件中.你需要注意你的程序权限是否充足.
      参数:
      SPBindToFile - JNAudio绑定的文件路径
      SPBindText - 此次绑定的语音
      另请参阅:
      • JNAudio

    • get_speech_size

      public int get_speech_size()
      Get the sound effect size of JN Audio 获取JNAudio的音效大小
      返回:
      int
      另请参阅:

      返回:

      另请参阅:

      public void updateAudioText(String text)

    • closeAudio

      public void closeAudio()
      Release Java objects and bound dll objects, if after freeing, you will not be able to make JN Audio calls, you need to use the init Model Init Model to rebind 释放Java对象以及绑定的dll对象，如果释放后，你将无法进行JNAudio的调用，需要使用initModel/InitModel重绑定
